mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew(crew_name, member, minute, distance, content, days, address, sido, sigungu, shortsido) VALUES(#{crew_name}, #{member}, #{minute}, #{distance}, #{content}, #{days}, #{address}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{shortsido})
INSERT INTO image(code_name, img_ori, img_new, img_no) VALUES(#{code_name}, #{img_ori}, #{img_new}, #{img_no})
INSERT INTO crew_member(crew_idx, id, is_leader) VALUES(#{crew_idx}, #{id}, #{is_leader})
INSERT INTO image(code_name, img_ori, img_new, img_no) VALUES(#{code_name}, #{img_ori}, #{img_new}, #{img_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE crew SET current_member = 0, use_yn = 'N' WHERE crew_idx = #{crew_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, i.img_ori, i.img_new, ct.tag_idx FROM crew c LEFT JOIN image i ON c.crew_idx = i.img_no AND i.code_name = 'I101' LEFT JOIN crew_tag ct ON c.crew_idx = ct.crew_idx WHERE c.crew_idx = #{crew_idx};
